name: Deck Duel Dojo
description:
Fight against yourself in this exhilirating card-based fighting game.

Deck Duel Dojo is an interesting take on the fighting game genre, replacing your normal inputs with cards! While this may seem a lot easier, it replaces fast reactions with strategy and in-depth knowledge of your opponent!

Made for the University of Portsmouth Fighting Game Jam

  • Producer - Josephine B. (2123061) 
  • Programming - Ashe L. (2111045)
  • Menu - Ethan S. (2110010)
  • UI Art - Bailey O'Halloran (2117920)
  • Character Art - Flynn C. (2110009)
  • Background Art - Ryan W. (2110305)

Music Used: Kikuo - Boy Sorcerer
